A problem with the Never Tire Method
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): A problem with the Never Tire Method
By Storm Wolf on Sunday, August 3, 2003 - 03:55 pm:

Im not quite sure why, but the save/reload method doesnt work on my game. It might be the GameBoy I am using (The Advance SP) or if I have faulty cartridge.


I tried it just now:

Monster: Salamander {Zuum/Dragon} (3rd. Gen, Fresh from the Studio)
Reliance: 20

Pow- 160
Int- 109
Acc- 155
Spd- 160
Def- 120
Lif- 126

Chars:
Up Tail
Up Fire


I did two light drills (Shove) before I hit "Seems to be a little tired". I then saved/reloaded exactly 30 times. It never went from "Seems to be a little tired". I did not got to the town or the store, fight, spar, or train that day.

By GoldenBoy on Sunday, August 3, 2003 - 07:53 pm:

You need permanent items (gems, cups, etc) for nevertired
to work.

Nevertired is not recommended, since it can lead to a cart
going bad even if its not bad yet.

By Storm Wolf on Monday, August 4, 2003 - 05:57 am:

Ah, I see. I just bought the Holy Cup and Now it works. Thanks!

By GoldenBoy on Monday, August 4, 2003 - 07:35 am:

Hope you took a monster with Charm to the shop. :)
